|footnotes = }} 'Suraneh' (, also Romanized as 'SÅ«rÄneh'; also known as 'SÄ«rÄn'
and 'Sirna') is a village in Qarah Kahriz Rural District, Qarah
Kahriz District, Shazand County, Markazi Province, Iran. At the 2006 census, its
population was 786, in 212 families.
